attributes.action: Exempt workers over 60 from National Insurance payments
attributes.additional_details: We are calling for this as many over-60s are struggling to survive due to what we believe has been incompetent government spending over the past 30 years.
attributes.background: We urge the Government to exempt workers over 60 from paying National Insurance (NI), in order to make it easier financially for older people to survive.
